name: My Therapist is a Futanari 2
description:
Futa on Male
A return visit to your new therapist leads to some unexpected developments.
Since you didn't follow the instructions she gave you last time to a T, more severe measures will now have to be taken.
Nobody said this will be easy...
Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.GameplayKinetic Visual Novel
H-Scenes
~4K words
Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
